name: Robe
description:
Robe robe robe...how long ago did you offer me your soul for arcane prowess?? Anyways, you can use your cantrips no charge but to use one of my spells it will cost you something capeesh?

I've trapped you in my infinite dungeon with some of your soon to be best friends. How long can you last? How deep can you delve?

Robe is a roguelike where you play as a procedurally generated wizard, in a procedurally generated dungeon, with procedurally generated enemies, in a procedurally generated world, in your computer chair, with procedurally generated thoughts...Made for the 7DRL Challenge 2023

**If you want to use the graveyard feature that tracks your runs download the game file!**
